text: Osteregaytes' nakazaniya i uderzhivaytes' ot bol'shikh grekhov, kotoryye portyat obshchestvo: otkaz ot uchastiya v srazhenii za Allakha, otkaz prizyvat' k dobromu i zapreshchat' durnoye, razdory. Posledstviya etikh grekhov vliyayut ne tol'ko na nespravedlivykh, no okhvatyvayut vsekh. I tvordo znayte, chto Allakh surov v nakazanii v blizhney zhizni i v budushchey
